name: Gluon (itch)
description:
Gluon is a twin stick shooter game.
As long as you are alive, you will become stronger and stronger.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Xbox controller:
Similar to Geometry Wars controls - Left Stick control the player and Right Stick shoot in the directions.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Keyboard and mouse controller:
W, A, S, D moves the player and mouse aim in the desired direction to shoot press mouse left button.
